description: Core libraries depend on project scaffold.
Backend JWT Guard depends on the Cognito User Pool details (issuer URL, etc.).
mitigation_plan: DevOps provides Cognito outputs (ARNs, URLs) to Backend team as soon as they are available.
impact_if_delayed: Delays all backend API security implementation.

description: Frontend wizard submission depends on the backend API for creating modes.
mitigation_plan: Define API contract in OpenAPI early, enabling frontend to develop against a mock server.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks completion of the custom mode creation feature.

description: The execution endpoint depends on the secure Lambda sandbox being implemented and deployed.
mitigation_plan: Prioritize sandbox implementation and testing early in the sprint.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire custom mode execution feature. High risk of cascading delays.

description: E2E tests for offline sync can only be written after the sync manager logic is complete.
mitigation_plan: QA engineer pairs with frontend developer during implementation to understand logic and prepare test cases.
impact_if_delayed: Delays quality validation for the offline feature.
